caption:
When wildfires swept through Los Angeles, thousands were forced to evacuate — including older adults in long-term care who rely on daily medication.

🤝 That’s when #TeamCVS jumped into action.

They rerouted deliveries in real time, navigated road closures and worked around the clock to help ensure every prescription got to the right place. Because missing even one dose could be life-threatening.

🙌 We’re grateful for the teammates who go the extra mile, even in moments of crisis. Read the full story at the #LinkInBio.
